title: Sound On: National Security and Vaccine
itunes:title: Sound On: National Security and Vaccine
description:
Bloomberg Chief Washington Correspondent Kevin Cirilli delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


“Guests: Josh Wingrove, Bloomberg White House reporter, Euan Rellie, Senior Managing Director at BDA Partners Inc, and Luis Miranda, Former DNC Communications Director and Director of Communications And Politics at Alloy (a nonprofit tech startup for building better data and technology for progressives) Former Ohio Republican Congressman Jim Renacci (Represented Ohio's 16th congressional district from 2011 to 2019), Rep. French Hill US Congressman representing Arkansas’s Second Congressional District, Republican.”


To listen on the Bloomberg terminal, click on the player thumbnail on the sidebar.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
